data.event: It was founded in 1872 by Jes√∫s Angel, a settler from Bernal.
Garita has a post office with ZIP code 88421, which opened on January 19, 1907; the post office used the name Variadero intermittently until the 1920s.

event.title: used the name Variadero intermittently until the 1920s
